data.meta_description: It's The Crazy Comedy, Humor & Satire Podcast, featuring Daniel D! Imagine Woody Allen on crack blended with Sam Kinison on acid, and you basically have Daniel D's sense of humor.
data.text:
This week, we discuss all you non-Irish culturally appropriating on St Patrick's Day, whether white people are actually colonizers, and a fun way to make money scamming people with ESG.

This episode of The Crazy Comedy, Humor & Satire PodcastÂ is brought to you by Libsyn, where you can begin your own great podcasting adventures. Sign up with promo code "DanielD" and get two months of free podcast hosting! Find out more atÂ https://signup.libsyn.com/?promo_code=DANIELD

Don't forget to subscribe to the podcast, so you don't miss out on any future fun! And for even more weirdness from Daniel D, visitÂ www.CrazyComedyHumor.comÂ andÂ AGhostInTheMachine.substack.com!
